sentence.Network_en: Some of the internal walls of my house are made of plasterboard.

sentence.Network_en: Cutting plasterboard will soon make the blade blunt.

entry.tran: （装饰内墙及天花板用的）石膏板
entry.def: Plasterboard is cardboard covered with plaster which is used for covering walls and ceilings instead of using plaster.

means.word_mean: 1. wallboard with a gypsum plaster core bounded to layers of paper or fiberboard; used instead of plaster or wallboard to make interior walls

auth_sentence.content: By contrast, stud partition walls, made from a timber frame overlaid with plasterboard, are non-load-bearing and easy to remove.
